name: Tomato Pappu
instructions: Cook toor dal until soft. In a pan, sauté onions, tomatoes, and green chillies. Add turmeric, tamarind, and mashed dal. Simmer and serve with rice.

name: Egg Burji
instructions: Chop onions and tomatoes. Sauté onions, then add tomatoes and green chillies. Add beaten eggs and stir until scrambled. Garnish with coriander.

name: Ridge Gourd Curry (Beerakaya Koora)
instructions: Peel and chop ridge gourd. Temper mustard seeds, add garlic, onions, chillies, and turmeric. Add ridge gourd and cook until soft.

name: Bottle Gourd Kootu (Suraikkai Kootu)
instructions: Cook moong dal and bottle gourd. Grind coconut, chilli, and cumin. Mix everything and temper with mustard seeds.

name: Drumstick Sambar
instructions: Cook dal. Boil drumsticks with tamarind and sambar powder. Combine with dal and temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Malabar Spinach Curry (Bachali Koora Pulusu)
instructions: Boil chopped spinach with tamarind, garlic, onion, and green chillies. Simmer and serve with rice.

name: Palakura Pappu (Spinach Dal)
instructions: Pressure cook dal and spinach with onion, tomato, chilli, and garlic. Temper and mix well.

name: Cauliflower Pepper Fry
instructions: Boil cauliflower. Sauté with garlic, onion, curry leaves, and pepper powder.

name: Cabbage Thoran
instructions: Finely chop cabbage. Mix with grated coconut, chilli, and cumin. Sauté and temper with mustard seeds.

name: Broad Beans Poriyal (Avarakkai Poriyal)
instructions: Chop and cook beans. Add grated coconut and temper with mustard seeds.

name: Alchanthakaya Curry (Cow Peas Curry)
instructions: Pressure cook peas. Sauté onion, garlic, tomato, and mix with cooked peas.

name: Ladies Finger Fry (Bendakaya Vepudu)
instructions: Chop and fry okra with onion, curry leaves, and chilli powder. Avoid water to prevent stickiness.

name: Ivy Gourd Fry (Dondakaya Vepudu)
instructions: Chop and fry ivy gourd with onion and mustard seeds until crisp.

name: Potato Roast (Urulaikizhangu Roast)
instructions: Boil and cube potatoes. Roast with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chilli powder.

name: Boiled Egg Curry
instructions: Boil eggs. Make a masala with onion, tomato, spices. Add eggs and simmer.

name: eggplant Curry (Vankaya Koora)
instructions: Chop brinjal. Cook with sautéed onion, tomato, and garlic. Temper with mustard seeds.

name: Gutthi Vankaya Curry
instructions: Stuff brinjal with spiced peanut-coconut paste. Cook in tamarind gravy.

name: Bagara Baingan
instructions: Make a thick masala with peanuts, sesame, and coconut. Cook brinjal in this spicy gravy.

name: Chicken Chettinad
instructions: Prepare masala with spices and coconut. Cook chicken until soft in the masala.

name: Andhra Kodi Kura (Andhra Chicken Curry)
instructions: Make a spicy masala with onion and spices. Add chicken and simmer till cooked.
